tooltip.onlineSynced: You are online. All changes saved.

offline.title: You are currently offline.
offline.description: Changes will be saved and synced when you reconnect.

syncing.title: Syncing Offline Changes
syncing.description: Uploading {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} made while you were offline.

synced.title: Sync Complete
synced.description: Your offline changes have been successfully saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync Failed
syncFailed.description: Could not sync offline changes. Will try again later.

queued.title: Action Queued
queued.description: This action was saved and will be synced when you're online.

offlineToast.description: This harvest has been saved to your device. It will be officially logged and a VTI will be generated once you are back online.
